page.title: 04Farmland(contd.).
page.content: An important crop is Potatoes, which are harvested by two entirely different methods i.e. by squads of gatherers and by a mechanical harvester. The seed_potatoes are exported all over the world _the varieties are Maris Piper,King Edwards,Duke of York,Records,Peers,Red Duke and Romano An experimental crop which is being grown in one field here is Triticale. Triticale is a tough strain of Wheat which grows to differing heights according to the variety. This particular type grows to 1.30 metres. The stock on the {stock farms}consists of cattle and sheep,plus a growing herd of goats.The breeds of sheep are Texel, Jacob, Blackface and Suffolk. The breeds of cattle are Limousin, Charlerois, Hereford, Friesian, Aberdeen-Angus and Simmental.
